languages.text: "А на вашей практике был случай с отрезанным от Империума сектором и погибающими планетами? Должен быть способ иначе показать власть Империума. Без смертей миллионов, например".

"Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."
languages.original_text: "А на вашей практике был случай с отрезанным от Империума сектором и погибающими планетами? Должен быть способ иначе показать власть Империума. Без смертей миллионов, например".

traits.locale_text: "Have you ever dealt with a sector cut off from the Imperium and planets dying before? There must be a way to display the power of the Imperium in a different manner. Without incurring the deaths of millions, for example."

"Have you ever dealt with a sector cut off from the Imperium and planets dying before? There must be a way to display the power of the Imperium in a different manner. Without incurring the deaths of millions, for example."

"Have you ever dealt with a sector being cut off from the Imperium and planets dying before? There must be a way to display the power of the Imperium in a different manner — without incurring the deaths of millions, for example."

"Have you ever dealt with a sector being cut off from the Imperium and planets dying before? There must be a way to display the power of the Imperium in a different manner — without incurring the deaths of millions, for example."

"Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

"Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

languages.text: «¿Tiene experiencia de primera mano con sectores enteros y planetas moribundos apartados del Imperium? Debe haber otras formas de demostrar el poder. Unas que no impliquen la muerte de millones, quiero decir».
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tiene experiencia de primera mano con sectores enteros y planetas moribundos apartados del Imperium? Debe haber otras formas de demostrar el poder. Unas que no impliquen la muerte de millones, quiero decir».

languages.text: “整个星区与帝国之间的联系都被切断了，无数行星在濒死的边缘挣扎。这一切你有没有亲身经历过？我相信，肯定这有其他方式来展现帝国的力量，比如说，某些不会让数以亿计的人一命呜呼的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: “整个星区与帝国之间的联系都被切断了，无数行星在濒死的边缘挣扎。这一切你有没有亲身经历过？我相信，肯定这有其他方式来展现帝国的力量，比如说，某些不会让数以亿计的人一命呜呼的方式。”

languages.text: 「帝国から切り離された星域全体や死にゆく惑星での実地経験はあるのか？力を示すための他の方法があるに違いない―例えば、数百万人の死を引き起こさないような方法が」
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国から切り離された星域全体や死にゆく惑星での実地経験はあるのか？力を示すための他の方法があるに違いない―例えば、数百万人の死を引き起こさないような方法が」

languages.text: « Parce que vous êtes une experte en matière de secteurs entiers et de planètes mourantes coupés du reste de l'Imperium, peut-être ? Il y a forcément d'autres moyens d'asseoir son autorité... des moyens qui ne se soldent pas par des millions de morts, par exemple. »
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous êtes une experte en matière de secteurs entiers et de planètes mourantes coupés du reste de l'Imperium, peut-être ? Il y a forcément d'autres moyens d'asseoir son autorité... des moyens qui ne se soldent pas par des millions de morts, par exemple. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'tan kopmuş bütün sektörler ve ölmekte olan gezegenler konusunda saha tecrüben var mı? Gücünü göstermenin başka yolları olmalı, milyonlarca cana mal olmayan yollar..."
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'tan kopmuş bütün sektörler ve ölmekte olan gezegenler konusunda saha tecrüben var mı? Gücünü göstermenin başka yolları olmalı, milyonlarca cana mal olmayan yollar..."

languages.text: "Habt Ihr bereits Erfahrung mit Sektoren und sterbenden Planeten, die vom Imperium abgeschnitten sind? Es muss andere Wege geben, Macht zu demonstrieren ... Wege, die nicht Millionen von Opfern fordern zum Beispiel."
languages.original_text: "Have you had much hands-on experience with entire sectors and dying planets being cut off from the Imperium? There must be other ways to display power — ones that do not incur the deaths of millions, for example."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr bereits Erfahrung mit Sektoren und sterbenden Planeten, die vom Imperium abgeschnitten sind? Es muss andere Wege geben, Macht zu demonstrieren ... Wege, die nicht Millionen von Opfern fordern zum Beispiel."
